computer_extension_attribute.name: OpenClaw Detection Status
computer_extension_attribute.description: Detects if OpenClaw is installed on the system. Returns 0 (Compliant) or 1 (Non-Compliant).

input_type.script:
#!/bin/bash
# OpenClaw Detection for Jamf Pro Extension Attribute # This is a simplified version that returns text for EA display
OPENCLAW_DETECTED=false
# Check CLI executable if command -v openclaw &> /dev/null; then OPENCLAW_DETECTED=true fi
# Check state directory if [[ -d "$HOME/.openclaw" ]]; then OPENCLAW_DETECTED=true fi
# Check configuration files if [[ -f "$HOME/.openclaw/config.yaml" ]]; then OPENCLAW_DETECTED=true fi
# Check for running processes if pgrep -if openclaw &> /dev/null; then OPENCLAW_DETECTED=true fi
# Return result for Jamf EA if [[ "$OPENCLAW_DETECTED" == "true" ]]; then echo "<result>Detected (Non-Compliant)</result>" else echo "<result>Not Detected (Compliant)</result>" fi
